detaileddescription.para: The processor statistics manager component vt::vrt::collection::balance::ProcStats, accessed via vt::theProcStats() manages instrumentation data from objects in a collection. It holds data per node on the timing of these objects and communication between them demarcated by phase and subphase.

When LB is invoked in vt, the LB Manager passes the processor statistics to the various LB strategies to run the load balancer. The processor statistics component can also dump the statistic data it holds to files, which can be read externally. The LBAF (Load Balancing Analysis Framework) can also then read this data to analyze the quality of the load distribution at any phase in the file.
